short_summary: Custom size ESDC and Service Canada envelopes
description: Printing services for custom size ESDC and Service Canada envelopes to deliver services and benefits to the public. Includes shipping services to various final destinations.
full_summary:
**Printing Services for Custom Size ESDC and Service Canada Envelopes**
===============

**Tender Reference:** PW-22-01008528

**Tender Status:** Expiring (Expired)

**Tender Closing Date:** 2022-10-28 14:00:00

**Contracting Entity:** Employment and Social Development Canada (ESDC)

**Notice Type:** Request for Proposal (RFP)

**Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding

**Purpose:**
---------------

ESDC requires printing services for custom size envelopes and shipping services to distribute printed products to various ESDC offices and locations across Canada.

**Scope of Work:**
------------------

The contractor must:

*   Print and deliver all items in full quantities according to the Statement of Work (SOW)
*   Accept and fulfill the printing order, and be responsible for quality control of print products, including distribution to various final destinations
*   Meet the specified delivery date and ensure they can meet this requirement before submitting a bid

**Period of Contract:**
----------------------

The contract period is from the date of contract to April 30, 2024, inclusive.

**Background Information:**
------------------------

The requirement is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), and the responsive bid with the highest combined rating of technical merit and price will be recommended for award of a contract.

**Submission and Evaluation:**
---------------------------

Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada. The evaluation criteria will be based on the Statement of Work (SOW).

**Attachments:**
arra
*   Amendment #3 (pdf)
*   Amendment #2 (pdf)
*   Amendment #1 (pdf)
*   Annex B - Annex C (xlsx)
*   Annex A - Administrative (zip)
*   Annex A - Industry (zip)
*   Annex A - Insurance (zip)
*   Annex A - Security Classification (zip)

**Contact Information:**
-------------------
